about_the_game:
SCP: Containment Chaos is a co-op horror survival game for 1-4 players. In a clandestine facility operated by the SCP Foundation, players take on the roles of Foundation agents tasked with containing and researching anomalous entities. A series of catastrophic events have caused the facility's containment protocols to fail, unleashing SCP entities into different parallel universes within the facility. Players must collaborate to regain control and contain these anomalies.

  • Co-Op Multiplayer
    Team up with friends and become foundation agents to tackle the challenges posed by various SCP entities.

  • Unique SCPs
    Each map presents a new set of anomalous entities, ensuring a fresh and terrifying experience.

  • Singleplayer
    Face the nightmarish horrors alone in singleplayer mode.

  • Unpredictability
    Experience heart-pounding unpredictability with each playthrough, no round will be the same. Make sure to be prepared with your MTF team.

  • Task-Based Gameplay
    Engage in a variety of task-based challenges tailored to the specific SCPs you encounter. Solve puzzles, conduct experiments, and face the unexpected as you work to maintain order amidst the chaos.

Do you have what it takes to contain the SCPs?

  • Replayability
    With a multitude of SCPs, randomized challenges, and parallel universes, SCP: Containment Chaos offers endless replayability. Each playthrough is a fresh, unpredictable experience, preventing repetitiveness and keeping players engaged.

  • In-Depth Lore
    Dive into the mysterious world of SCPs, uncovering their backstories and learning more about their peculiar and often terrifying natures. Delve deep into the lore of the SCP Foundation and the anomalies it seeks to contain.

  • Rising Aggression
    As you complete tasks and achieve milestones the SCP becomes increasingly aggressive and speed increases. This dynamic difficulty system keeps you on your toes and ensures that no mission is ever predictable, ratcheting up the tension and fear as you progress.

Warning

This game contains flashing lights and visual effects that may not be suitable for individuals with epilepsy or light sensitivity. Player discretion is advised.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or i3 (new gens) or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050-Ti or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: More disk space will be required in the future

Become SCP Foundation agents tasked with containing and researching anomalous entities in parallel universes. Solve a variety of unique tasks tailored to each SCP, all while striving to maintain order in the unimaginable chaos.
